meanings.definition: A type of flat, unleavened bread or cake made of oatmeal or barley meal.
meanings.sent1: Grandma baked delicious bannocks for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh bannocks every morning.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole a bannock from the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The golden bannocks of the sun warmed the fields.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of bannocks filled the cozy kitchen.
